thread.title: NBA Rumors: Anthony Davis needs effective supporting cast for Pelicans to emerge, report says
thread.title_full: NBA Rumors: Anthony Davis needs effective supporting cast for Pelicans to emerge, report says | NOLA.com

author: John Reid, NOLA.com | The Times Picayune
title: NBA Rumors: Anthony Davis needs effective supporting cast for Pelicans to emerge, report says
text:
New Orleans Pelicans star power forward Anthony Davis is considered to be the best young player in the NBA. Last season, he led the Pelicans to their first playoff berth since 2011.
But a story posted in ESPN's Grantland blog , takes a look at the Pelicans' supporting cast and if the Pelicans have the necessary parts to take full advantage of Davis in his prime.
The report mentions that Jrue Holiday's health will be a huge factor in Alvin Gentry's ability to retool and improve the Pelicans offensive style with his up-tempo system.
Recharged point guard Ty Lawson hoping to get back on track with the Houston Rockets.
Pelicans are showing signs of becoming a cohesive unit after the second day of training camp at The Greenbrier in West Virginia.
